citations.narrative:
- A PVC drain pipe in a lower corner enclosure of the second kennel building had an excessive accumulation of debris,
grime, and staining. This is a potential risk of contamination to the enclosed animals. Hard surfaces which the dogs may
contact must be spot cleaned daily and sanitized appropriately to prevent accumulation of waste and reduce disease
hazards. Facility must clean this pipe and ensure continued cleaning of all hard surfaces going forward.
This is a (1st) Re-License Inspection for a Class “A” license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the
applicant.
All items must be in compliance within 2 more inspections or by 23 November 2025 or the applicant will forfeit the license
fee and must wait 6 months to reapply. Please contact your inspector to schedule your next Re-License Inspection.
Regulated activity can continue under your existing USDA license until it expires.
n

narrative:
3.1(c)(3) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
- A PVC drain pipe in a lower corner enclosure of the second kennel building had an excessive accumulation of debris, 
grime, and staining. This is a potential risk of contamination to the enclosed animals. Hard surfaces which the dogs may 
contact must be spot cleaned daily and sanitized appropriately to prevent accumulation of waste and reduce disease 
hazards. Facility must clean this pipe and ensure continued cleaning of all hard surfaces going forward. 
 
This is a (1st) Re-License Inspection for a Class “A” license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the 
applicant. 
 
All items must be in compliance within 2 more inspections or by 23 November 2025 or the applicant will forfeit the license 
fee and must wait 6 months to reapply. Please contact your inspector to schedule your next Re-License Inspection. 
 
Regulated activity can continue under your existing USDA license until it expires. 
 
 n
